name: n3lims-frontend
description: Laboratory Information Management System for sample unit and associated data management

scripts.prisma: cd ./backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && npx prisma generate && npx prisma studio
scripts.install-deps: cd ./frontend && npm install && cd .. && cd ./backend && npm install
